item.title: All-American Alternative to Leftist Omaha Steaks
item.description: Jim Hoft of Gateway Pundit exposed Omaha Steak’s leftism yesterday. Omaha pulled its ads from Glenn Beck for ideological reasons. We took your comments regarding the Glenn Beck Program to heart. After further review and careful consideration, we have decided to pull all advertising from Glenn Beck programming effective December 20th, 2010. Then the president of the company, Bruce Simon, tried to deny his political motives. If you want to order top quality meats at great prices, you don’t have to put money in a lefty’s pocket.
